tool.name: Word Vector Descriptor
tool.description: Uversky plot to analyze ordered and disordered proteins
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
Calculates word vector based descriptors derived from Skip-gram model.
-----
**Inputs** * **--InputFasta** A fasta file with negative and positive samples. * **--ModelInput** Skip-gram model as ".txt" file generated from "Word_Vector_Model". * **--row** Number of traning samples. * **--positive** Positive samples. * **--negative** Negative samples.
-----
**Outputs** * **--OutFile** Tabular file with descriptor data.
.. _fastp: https://github.com/OpenGene/fastp
